Summary: lites appeared, zipped left,descended, at angle toward me, rose back up and slowly left area
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sunman
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming home from work about 1:30 indiana time, when about 15 degrees to my right, above the trees triangle formation of red lights came on, in an instant zipped to a position directly in front of me, as i drove closer they suddenly zipped down at an angle directly at me stopped hovered for a moment zipped back to prior position in front of me hovered for a moment, then slowly moved south east somewhat in the direction of greater cincinnati airport (cvg) it was very odd that something could zip that fast stop and zip again without change of speed being noticed no jerkiness no swaying swerving almost as if but not a light turn on in one spot then turn on in another it was that fast, but didnt go out. in sept 2011 while my wife and i were visiting our son who is usaf aircraft mechanic, our other sons one also usaf aircraft mechanic and other son witnessed several red lights in approximately same place, but hovering over woods by our home, but started out with 2 or 3 lights then other lights joined and lined up hovered over the woods for a while then left area, i told them to call 911 non emergency so that it could be documented, she said there have been many sighting in the area, but she saidwell just call it a shooting star my usaf son told her he was in usaf and knows its not a an airplane or shooting star, she said maybe it was the satellite that was to fall, but didnt fall at that time. so she said again well just call it a shooting star. my parents seen the triangle also above their property a couple years earlier. but it had a whitish blue light in middle. and dad said he could see surface of it and it looked like riveted panels?????????it seems odd that the thing would frequent the area. any help would be greatly appreciated. and will definitely help any way i can.
